segment.source: Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) 4.6 provides the following enhancements and new features for the App-V Desktop Client, Client for Remote Desktop Services and App-V Sequencer:
segment.target: Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) 4.6 provides the following enhancements and new features for the App-V Desktop Client, Client for Remote Desktop Services and App-V Sequencer:

segment.source: Support for 64-bit applications—provides the ability to sequence and run 32-bit and 64-bit applications on 64-bit versions of Windows 7, Windows Vista, Windows XP, Windows Server 2008, Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows Server 2003 and Windows Server 2003 R2.
segment.target: Support for 64-bit applications—provides the ability to sequence and run 32-bit and 64-bit applications on 64-bit versions of Windows 7, Windows Vista, Windows XP, Windows Server 2008, Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows Server 2003 and Windows Server 2003 R2.

segment.source: For more information about supported operating systems, see Application Virtualization Deployment Requirements.
segment.target: For more information about supported operating systems, see Application Virtualization Deployment Requirements.

segment.source: Support for Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008 R2—provides support for Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008 R2, including support for Windows 7 features such as the taskbar, Jump Lists, AppLocker, BranchCache, and BitLocker To Go.
segment.target: Support for Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008 R2—provides support for Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008 R2, including support for Windows 7 features such as the taskbar, Jump Lists, AppLocker, BranchCache, and BitLocker To Go.

segment.source: Expands globalization and localization—provides support for 12 additional languages.
segment.target: Expands globalization and localization—provides support for 12 additional languages.

segment.source: Support for Virtual Desktop Infrastructure (VDI) systems—provides the capability for the read-only shared cache to help optimize server disk storage in VDI scenarios.
segment.target: Support for Virtual Desktop Infrastructure (VDI) systems—provides the capability for the read-only shared cache to help optimize server disk storage in VDI scenarios.

segment.source: Improved sequencing experience—provides improvements to the sequencing wizard and support for sequencing 32-bit and 64-bit applications.
segment.target: Improved sequencing experience—provides improvements to the sequencing wizard and support for sequencing 32-bit and 64-bit applications.

segment.source: The App-V Management Server and Streaming Server have not been updated to version 4.6.
segment.target: The App-V Management Server and Streaming Server have not been updated to version 4.6.

segment.source: Until they are updated, use App-V Management Server and Streaming Server 4.5 with the most recent service pack.
segment.target: Until they are updated, use App-V Management Server and Streaming Server 4.5 with the most recent service pack.

segment.source: Provides the most up-to-date information about known issues with Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) 4.6.
segment.target: Provides the most up-to-date information about known issues with Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) 4.6.
